title: Gift of Magic Icon
body: Do you get it when you gift one of the champs? Because i still haven't got mine yet.

replies.body:
Rineyy with the assist {{summoner:31}} 

If you still don't have the icon by then, hit us up in a ticket and we'll get it sorted out!
The event ends on 11:59 PM PDT on April 26th. It can take 2 weeks to grant your icon after the event has ended.
